data.detailed_description:
legacy Of Sin the Father Sacrifice


Six Songs that make up the repertoire of the game Legacy of Sin the Father Sacrifice, epic battle songs and also more peaceful and relaxing songs, try these unique songs created especially for this game.

What are you waiting for?! This is your time, GO!
